description: This table stores information about the advanced order groups that are included in a treatment day of a treatment plan.

columns.name: TREATMENT_DAY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient order group record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DT
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: ADV_ORD_GRP_CSN
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of an advanced order group (OSQ) record that is included in this treatment day.

columns.name: ADV_ORD_GRP_MODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The mode of this advanced order group, such as Single-Select, Multi-Select, or Select-All.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Basic


Single-Select


Multi-Select


Select-All

columns.name: ADV_ORD_GRP_TITLE
columns.description: The title of this advanced order group.
